text: The Young Rajah is a 1922 American romantic drama movie directed by Phil Rosen and based on the novel of the Amos Judd by John Ames Mitchell. It stars Rudolph Valentino, Wanda Hawley, Charles Ogle, Fanny Midgley, Josef Swickard, J. Farrell MacDonald, George Field and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1922 romantic drama movies Category:1920s American romance movies Category:1920s American drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Phil Rosen
title: The Young Rajah
